drag-and-drop-part-1.title: Drag and Drop
drag-and-drop-part-1.description: How to change the order of cells in a collection and a table. How to move cells to another collection. How to move multiple cells in a group.
drag-and-drop-part-1.author: ivanvorobei

uisheetpresentationcontroller.title: UISheetPresentationController as in the Maps application
uisheetpresentationcontroller.description: In iOS 15, sheet controllers have appeared. They can be dragged and dropped with height changes. You've seen these controllers in the Maps and Shares apps.
uisheetpresentationcontroller.author: ivanvorobei

how-to-delete-userdefaults-on-macos-cata.title: How to clear UserDefaults for Mac Catalyst
how-to-delete-userdefaults-on-macos-cata.description: How to clear data for Catalyst application including AppGroup, Realm and UserDefaults.
how-to-delete-userdefaults-on-macos-cata.author: ivanvorobei

edge-insets-uibutton.title: Edge Insets for UIButton
edge-insets-uibutton.description: How to add an indent between the picture and the header in a button. How to place the icon to the right of the header.
edge-insets-uibutton.author: ivanvorobei

product-page-optimization-alternative-ic.title: Alternative icons for Product Page Optimization
product-page-optimization-alternative-ic.description: How to add alternative icons for A/B tests on the application page.
product-page-optimization-alternative-ic.author: alxrguz

how-add-view-to-swiftui-library.title: How to add custom SwiftUI View to View Library
how-add-view-to-swiftui-library.description: In that article, I teach you how to add a code snippet to the Library.
how-add-view-to-swiftui-library.author: wmorgue

async-await.title: Asynchrony with async/await/actor
async-await.description: Let's take apart async, await, and actor. Let's write an ace using the new tools.
async-await.author: somenkovnikita

keyboard-shortcut-swiftui.title: Key combinations in SwiftUI
keyboard-shortcut-swiftui.description: Get to know the `keyboardShortcut` modifier. Let's add modifiers for keys `.command`, `.option`, `.shift`.
keyboard-shortcut-swiftui.author: wmorgue

access-control.title: Access levels in Swift
access-control.description: Consider the access levels and how to secure your code with them.
access-control.author: liubowolkova
